intro: Relhania tuberosa, commonly known as the tuberous relhania, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae and is characterized by its tuberous roots, which store nutrients for the plant. Relhania tuberosa is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value and has traditional uses in some regions.
